com.driveway.Component.TTextView.android:text: Book park space - select length of stay
Short stay includes 15 min, 30 min, 60 min stay
Hourly stay includes 1-4 hours, 5-8 hours, 8+ hours stay
Daily Stay includes Half Day (up to 6 hours), Full day\n(up to 12 hours) stay
Weekly Stay includes 3 days, 5 days, 7 days stay
Monthly Stay includes 14 days, 30 days stay
